replies.body:
A lot of the new splash arts make it very hard to identify them quickly on the minimap icons. They seem to all have the same, dark, monotone colour scheme and they don't stand out from eachother.

E.G. I could look at minimap quickly at a glance and see a bright Ahri face and tell its her immediately, and I could look slightly to the right and see a face with with a big purple hat and immediately tell that it's Caitlyn.
Now I would look at minimap and see two faces with a dark blue/purple colour scheme and have to look carefully to distinguish the two.

Indeed. It sucks for champ select aswell.
It seems, these days, that all rito cares about is eSports, but they are becoming more and more difficult to watch. I have no leads on why rito could possibly think this is a good idea.
Rito has been listening to emperor palpatine and joined the dark side - now they are known as Darth Rito

The thing that bothers me with the new Ahri splash is that she doesn't look asian anymore. Rito gives Ahri all these kpop references in her dance, and all over popstar ahri. Then they make her new splash look like an alternative-styled westerner. (An American/European that dyed her hair black.) While I do think the new splash looks more crisp and detailed, the old one had a certain attribute to it.

I also don't really see why it was changed either, I actually prefer it... and she actually looks somewhat Asian in the first one, the new one looks closer to a "Westernized" model to be honest.

It's good, it just doesn't seem right for her.

Maybe Ahri did what all Korean girls do and had that eyelid surgery and stuff.

> and she actually looks somewhat Asian in the first one, the new one looks closer to a "Westernized" model to be honest.
I hear Zaunite plastic surgery has been booming recently, or she could've started siphoning off a lot of white dudes, the speculation is endless.

Oh and here's another sucky thing

They removed her bell chain, which is actually present on her in-game model AND makes sounds during some of her idle animations and her laugh.

That bell is op. I love it way too much, and now it's just gone. :(

Riot....

Looks like I'll be adding Ahri's old art into my custom LoL mods.

- To westernized i facial features

One thing I enjoyed a lot about A New Dawn is that they somehow made Ahri look especially "foxlike". There was something about her facial structure, especially at certain moments, that seemed just subtly non-human. Something about her mouth/jaw as she breathes.

http://gamerhavennews.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/ahri-cinematic.png

If they're going to adjust her face, I think it should be in that direction.

They screwed up a lot with A New Dawn, but aside from the blue eyes and strange proportions, she did look better in the cinematic.  This new splash makes her look more like a cat than a fox, and she loses a lot of the alluring feel - she looks practically dead in this one.  It's made worse by her hair being tangled, yeah, her face looks way off, and her background makes it seem like she's in the Shadow Isles. Slight changes I would make (assuming I had artistic skill)-

i love it, as an ahri main :)

Well, everything in this picture has like the same themed color... It's very monotonous in the color? Also, the eyes look too human. :/ or at least in my opinion. The eye is the window to the soul and especially in picture, it's always certainly true. The old Ahri had pale skin, blue hair in a very green and foresty background. This just about made every part of her stand out. Like her hair, her clothing, the perfectness of the skin, her eye lining, her orb, even the faint whisker slash on her face. But in the new splash art, the colors are all dark and indifferent. Truthfully, the only thing I looked and observed first was the orb because that's where the burst of colour stood out. Perhaps, you can make her pale skin show out more when it's facing the orb, rather than the vice versa. Make her hair a lighter tone, but darkened by the background, but stands out in the orb area. Show the initial Ahri whisker. make the ears stand out more, perhaps in a cute seductive way. Making the area where the orb lighter and the outside darker can drastically make her stand out and make her look way different, well at least in my opinion. Also, her eyes should have like a middle-east or perhaps Egyptian eyeliner instead of a anglo-saxon everyday girl make up eyeliner. It would also be cool if her hair kind of circled around the orb, just the faintest, and make it a very straight-yet purmmed hair and have a little braid at the end of her hair that gathers it all together in a clean Eastern hairstyle that usually is braided in a manner to show a woman that's seductive to men, but doesn't try to be. And perhaps making her nails longer and tilt her head in a way to look as if she's just about to swiftly run and leave, in a leading manner. But I think that this is a good skin, overall. Just needs some more thought and consideration to make it either really perfect or a complete buster of Ahri's image.
